channel.title: Posts on ⚓ Widget Factory: Brian Danowski's Blog about Tech, Programming, Devops, and Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ⚓ Widget Factory: Brian Danowski's Blog about Tech, Programming, Devops, and Stuff

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello and welcome to the blog. We are hard at work building different stuff. The current plan is to elevate certain nuggets of knowledge from my notes scratchpad to real live blog posts with meta tags and everything. That’s great. This site is built on hugo. I had a hard time getting hugo to compile on my digital ocean vm so I (forked the repo) and added some binaries. Cool story bro.
